extracted_text:
On August 26, 2025, JSW Steel announced the incorporation of a joint venture company, APJSW Private Limited, with the Andhra Pradesh Mineral Development Corporation (APMDC) . This was a substantial corporate development intended to enhance the company's raw material security.

Key details of the joint venture include:

Purpose:To set up and operate the Konijedu Marlapadu Integrated Iron Ore Project in Andhra Pradesh.

Objective:To mine and beneficiate low-grade iron ore.

Investment:The project involves an investment of â‚¹1,075 crore.

Ownership:JSW Steel holds an 89% equity stake in the new company, with APMDC holding the remaining 11%.

Strategic importance:The project is expected to provide JSW Steel with 1.3 million tons of beneficiated iron ore concentrate annually, helping replace imported ore and resulting in cost savings.
